title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Earth Systems Kid's Page
body: Earth Systems Kid's Page            Hello kids! I'm Dinama Stabenstein. I'm a geology grade student. I'm quick and hungry. If you want to know more about me, see my biography. I hope that you are hungry to learn more about Earth Systems. If you are, check out these very cool Web sites:          Amazing Space     Space Place for Kids       Johnson Space Flight Center Just for Kids   Explore Glaciers       Electricity and Magnetism     Kid's Science Project - Children's experiments with magnets       Riding to the Earth's Core      The Earth       Geo-Mysteries                             Click here to learn how to become an Official GEODETECTIVE member and get a cool patch.        GEODETECTIVE Home - Earth Systems Home Contact our Education Outreach Specialist here.
